TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TraceContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 捕获并提供有关 Web 请求的执行详细信息。

span.span: Captures and presents execution details about a Web request.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类可用于将消息附加到特定的跟踪类别。You can use this class to append messages to specific trace categories. 例如，如果要创建的实例类对于应用程序中，您可以包含"开始呈现"跟踪消息在呈现过程中和"引发 OnChange 事件"中的事件处理程序过程中。For example, if you are creating an instance of the class for your application, you might include the trace message "Starting To Render" in a rendering procedure, and "Raising OnChange Event" in an event handler procedure. 此外可以使用类来获取一组自定义处理的请求执行结束时的跟踪记录。You can also use the class to obtain a set of trace records at the end of request execution for custom processing. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 跟踪概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Tracing Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1552561d-887c-4002-8770-f92662cdf416). 若要启用跟踪，请设置`Trace`中的属性[@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指令或属性设置为`true`。To enable tracing, set the `Trace` attribute in the [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive or the property to `true`. 启用跟踪后，显示用户提供的跟踪内容，除了类会自动包括的性能数据、 控件树的结构信息，并为每个请求的状态管理内容。When tracing is enabled, in addition to showing user-provided trace content, the class automatically includes performance data, control-tree structure information, and state management content for every request.

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置用来指示是否启用对当前 Web 请求的跟踪的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether tracing is enabled for the current Web request.

value.span: 如果已启用跟踪，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if tracing is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此标志来检查是否在页面或应用程序应输出跟踪信息之前它将任何内容写入到跟踪日志。Use this flag to check whether your page or application should output tracing information before it writes anything to the trace log. 值属性上的子节中的设置取决于`system.web`配置节和的值`trace`指令的特性。The value of the property depends on the settings in the subsection of the `system.web` configuration section and the value of the `trace` attribute of the directive. 在页面指令中设置的跟踪选项优先于配置文件中设置的选项。The tracing option set in the page directive takes precedence over the option set in the configuration file. 设置值以编程方式将优先于页指令特性和配置设置。Setting the value programmatically takes precedence over both the page directive attribute and the configuration setting. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性设置为`true`整个应用程序，必须显式设置此属性为`false`您不想显示的跟踪信息的应用程序中任何页面。If you set the property to `true` for an entire application, you must explicitly set this property to `false` for any page in the application for which you do not want tracing information displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确定是否为页面启用跟踪。The following code example demonstrates how you can determine whether tracing is enabled for a page. 该代码循环访问中的数据集，在该数据集写入跟踪语句为每个行的行。The code iterates through the rows in a dataset, writing trace statements for each row in that dataset. [!code-csharp[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.IsEnabled Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

.event class System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler TraceFinished
Public Custom Event TraceFinished As TraceContextEventHandler
public: event System::Web::TraceContextEventHandler ^ TraceFinished;
member this.TraceFinished : System.Web.TraceContextEventHandler

summary.span: 由 对象引发，用于在收集完所有请求信息后公开跟踪消息。

span.span: Raised by the object to expose trace messages after all request information is gathered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期间引发事件`EndRequest`的 HTTP 请求处理阶段。The event is raised during the `EndRequest` stage of HTTP request processing. 通过引发对象的所有请求信息都收集后，若要公开的集合消息，以注册委托。It is raised by a object after all request information is gathered, to expose the collection of messages to registered delegates. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何注册来处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how you can register a to handle the event. 在此示例中，委托将循环执行跟踪消息，并将其写入到响应流;但是，您可以向数据库或分析工具使用者编写相同的信息。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them to the response stream; however, you could write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/CS/form3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_3/VB/form3vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 获取或设置跟踪消息输出到请求浏览器应遵循的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the sorted order in which trace messages should be output to a requesting browser.
One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 默认为配置文件的 节中 特性指定的设置（该设置的默认值为 ）。

span.span: The default is the setting specified by the attribute in the section of a configuration file, whose default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪消息可以按顺序按其处理，或按字母顺序通过用户定义的类别进行排序。Trace messages can be sorted in the order they were processed, or alphabetically by user-defined category. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对页面的跟踪语句按字母顺序通过已分配给这些语句的类别。The following code example demonstrates how you can sort a page's trace statements alphabetically by the categories that you have assigned to the statements. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic TraceContext.TraceMode Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 所选的值不是 枚举值之一。

span.span: The selected value is not one of the enumeration values.
ASP.NET Tracing Overview

summary.span: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log.

summary.span: 与 不同，所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: Unlike , all warnings appear in the log as red text.

summary.span: 将跟踪消息写入跟踪日志。

span.span: Writes a trace message to the trace log.

summary.span: 所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用方法时，跟踪消息添加到消息集合中，在处理时可访问该事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息时使用其属性设置为`true`并将其属性设置为`null`。The message is added with its property set to `true` and its property set to `null`.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息写入跟踪日志，包括用户定义的所有类别、跟踪消息和错误消息。

span.span: Writes trace information to the trace log, including any user-defined categories, trace messages, and error information.

summary.span: 所有警告在日志中均显示为红色文本。

span.span: All warnings appear in the log as red text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用方法时，跟踪消息添加到消息集合中，在处理时可访问该事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息时使用其属性设置为`true`，并属性设置为传递的对象`errorInfo`参数。The message is added with its property set to `true`, and the property is set to the object passed by the `errorInfo` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法将一条错误跟踪消息写入跟踪日志。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此示例中，为错误和警告跟踪不同的异常。In this example, different exceptions are traced as errors and warnings. 当该页引发，它将写入警告消息使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes a warning message using the method. 当该页引发，它将写入错误消息使用方法。When the page throws an , it writes an error message using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/CS/form4cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Trace_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Trace_4/VB/form4vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用方法时，跟踪消息添加到消息集合中，在处理时可访问该事件。Every time the method is called, a trace message is added to the messages collection, which is accessible when you handle the event. 添加消息时使用其属性设置为`false`并将其属性设置为`null`。The message is added with its property set to `false` and its property set to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法将一条错误跟踪消息写入跟踪日志。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to write an error trace message to the trace log. 在此示例中，委托将循环执行跟踪消息，并将其写入作为 HTML 表;但是，您可以向数据库或分析工具使用者编写相同的信息。In this example, the delegate iterates through the trace messages and writes them as an HTML table; however, you can write the same information to a database or a profiling tool consumer.
